petalcluster 0.0.0.1
  • Reference

Density-Based Clustering via Rust

Source: R/petalcluster-package.R
petalcluster-package.Rd

R bindings to the petal-clustering Rust crate by Petabi, Inc., providing fast implementations of three density-based clustering algorithms:

  • petal_dbscan() — DBSCAN: finds clusters as dense regions separated by areas of lower density.

  • petal_hdbscan() — HDBSCAN: hierarchical extension of DBSCAN that adapts to clusters of varying density.

  • petal_optics() — OPTICS: produces a reachability ordering that captures cluster structure at multiple density thresholds.

All three accept numeric matrices or data frames, support Euclidean and cosine distance metrics, and return S3 objects with print() and plot() methods.

Author

Maintainer: First Last first.last@example.com
